title: Which are the best forums for technology blogs? - Quora

response.answer_text: I've answered a similar question earlier, but I'll answer it again. Being obsessed with tech and owning a tech website I always want best tech news and unbiased reviews, in my opinion the followings are the best sources for technology news. Techcrunch ( one of best ranked tech website) - TechCrunch Android authority (frequent tech news on every article) - Android Authority KNineVox (A growing website and writes only on valuable tech news) - KNine Vox TheVerge (tech news from cars to smartphones) - The Verge Android Police (Android related every news) - androidpolice.com

Check out ‘STADIVM’… It’s an online community forum for emerging technologies. The platform features its own tech news blog also. It’s a really neat and unique concept and community where people come to share and learn about emerging tech and ways which it can be optimized and monetized by discovering new and valuable services, products, methods, etc. Tech Forum - Make Money with Cryptocurrency, AI, VR and Blockchain: Stadivm  Stadivm’s core belief: "We believe that the connection of inspired minds is the key to a brighter future."
